Name: Abandoned Mineworks
Description: A maze of tunnels, still walked by those who died here.

Name: Akkhan's Grasp
Description: Evil and blood seep through the tomb's ruptured seals.

Name: Aldurwood
Description: In this corrupted wood, blood runs like sap from the trees.

Name: Ancestors' Favor
Description: You earn 10% more Experience while within this dungeon.

Name: Ancestral Awakening
Description: You earn 20% more Glyph Experience at the end of this dungeon.

Name: Ancient Reservoir
Description: A tainted wellspring runs under these ruins.

Name: Ancient's Lament
Description: A tomb and prison for the anguished souls trapped within.

Name: Anica's Claim
Description: Inhuman hands carved out these dark tunnels.

Name: Armor Breakers
Description: Monster attacks from a distance reduce your Armor by 7% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 35%.

Name: Avenger
Description: Killing a monster enrages monsters near it after a short delay, making them deal more damage.

Name: Backstabbers
Description: Close monster attacks from behind cause you to become Vulnerable. Vulnerable damage taken is increased by 35%.

Name: Barrier Breakers
Description: Monsters deal 100% more damage to Barriers.

Name: Bastion of Faith
Description: Lost and starving, the knights became beasts.

Name: Battle Hardened
Description: Gain 6% damage reduction for every 10% Health you are missing.

Name: Beast Graveyard
Description: Scavengers often come to profit off the holy giants.

Name: Belfry Zakara
Description: The Zakarum built this Cathedral. It honors the sea, now.

Name: Belial's Apparitions
Description: Elite Apparitions have invaded this dungeon.

Name: Betrayed Tomb
Description: Spirits writhe as hollows screech out in monstrous agony.

Name: Betrayer's Row
Description: The twisted remains of a town driven mad by envy.

Name: Black Asylum
Description: An abandoned prison teeming with the wails of its inmates.

Name: Blind Burrows
Description: The spiders here have acquired a taste for flesh.

Name: Blood Blister
Description: Killing a monster has a chance to spawn a Blood Blister. After a short time, it explodes, dealing heavy area damage.

Name: Bloodsoaked Crag
Description: A feasting ground for the flesh-hungry.

Name: Broken Bulwark
Description: Once part of Donan's estate, and razed with the rest.

Name: Buried Halls
Description: The Triune fight to reclaim these ancient halls.

Name: Caldera Gate
Description: The demons in this icy cave are growing stronger.

Name: Calibel's Mine
Description: The bandits that took this mine are ignorant of its secrets.

Name: Carrion Fields
Description: The defilers of this land were cursed to wander it forever.

Name: Caves of Kutokue
Description: Screams of desperation echo in the walls.

Name: Champion's Demise
Description: Once beautiful homelands now overrun with demons.

Name: Charnel House
Description: Bodies are stored here, some still alive. Food for demons.

Name: Collapsed Vault
Description: In dead hands do these ancient treasures lie.

Name: Conclave
Description: Tales of profane rituals grip the people with fear.

Name: Control Impaired Explosions
Description: Being hit by Control Impairing Effects creates an explosion around you.

Name: Corrupted Grotto
Description: The forgotten dead languish under barren rock.

Name: Crumbling Hekma
Description: A hate-infested catacomb of the Zakarum faith.

Name: Crusaders' Cathedral
Description: Knights seized this temple and its undead warriors alike.

Name: Cultist Refuge
Description: The last bastion of Nostrava’s cultists.

Name: Dark Ravine
Description: A Triune ritual site. The screams echo far and wide.

Name: Dead Man's Dredge
Description: The predators that dwell in this cave hunt human game.

Name: Death Pulse
Description: Killing a monster releases a deadly shadow pulse after a short delay.

Name: Defiled Catacomb
Description: Graverobbers warn against the temptations of this crypt.

Name: Demon's Wake
Description: The keep still burns in the wake of Lilith’s attack.

Name: Derelict Lodge
Description: Once a hunting lodge, now ruled by demons.

Name: Deserted Underpass
Description: A threat lurks in caves under the ruined Overlook.

Name: Dodge Breakers
Description: Monster attacks from a distance reduce dodge chance by 12% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 60%.

Name: Domhainne Tunnels
Description: Corbach residents hear the screams from the Khazra’s lair.

Name: Drifting Shade
Description: Drifting Shade chases players. Upon reaching them, it explodes for heavy damage and creates a Nightmare Field that Dazes victims.

Name: Earthen Wound
Description: The demons that dwelled here became a feast for cannibals.

Name: Elemental Totems
Description: Elemental Totems occasionally spawn in combat that buff Nearby Enemies until destroyed.

Name: Empowered Elites (Cold Enchanted)
Description: Elites always have the "Cold Enchanted" affix.

Name: Empowered Elites (Poison Enchanted)
Description: Elites always have the "Poison Enchanted" affix.

Name: Empowered Elites (Shadow Enchanted)
Description: Elites always have the "Shadow Enchanted" affix.

Name: Empowered Elites (Shock Lance)
Description: Elites always have the "Shock Lance" affix.

Name: Empowered Elites (Suppressor)
Description: Elites always have the "Suppressor" affix.

Name: Empowered Elites (Teleporter)
Description: Elites always have the "Teleporter" affix.

Name: Endless Gates
Description: Unholy creatures run amok between realms.

Name: Extra Shrines
Description: Extra Shrines will appear in the dungeon.

Name: Faceless Shrine
Description: One of Hawezar’s less secretive cults. Sinners welcome.

Name: Fading Echo
Description: These ruins have become host to a growing army of demons.

Name: Farai Cliffs
Description: The blood of outsiders glistens in the moonlight.

Name: Feeding Grounds
Description: Fresh victims are fed to the demons in this place.

Name: Ferals' Den
Description: A lodge corrupted by the druids' hate.

Name: Fetid Mausoleum
Description: A forgotten tomb for the restless dead of Eridu.

Name: Fire Damage
Description: You deal 15% more Fire damage.

Name: Flooded Depths
Description: More than the waters have made claim to these shipwrecks.

Name: Forbidden City
Description: An ancient tomb lies open, its corruption spilling forth.

Name: Forge of Malice
Description: The fires of hatred continue to burn in this hidden refuge.

Name: Forgotten Altar
Description: This world will always spawn a Forgotten Altar.

Name: Forgotten Depths
Description: A shadow lies below these hallowed stones.

Name: Forgotten Remains
Description: Villagers have mysteriously disappeared in this vicinity.

Name: Forgotten Ruins
Description: Serpents infest the bones of these forbidden mage halls.

Name: Forsaken Quarry
Description: These once-barren mineshafts now harbor ghastly rituals.

Name: Frost Damage
Description: You deal 15% more Frost damage.

Name: Garan Hold
Description: A once mighty stronghold, doomed to burn.

Name: Ghoa Ruins
Description: Once a keep. The swamp reclaims all that mortal hands build.

Name: Gold Find
Description: You find 30% more gold.

Name: Grinning Labyrinth
Description: These labyrinthine halls have broken far greater warriors.

Name: Guulrahn Canals
Description: A rot that even the cannibal tyrant will not touch is below.

Name: Guulrahn Slums
Description: Cannibals still hold the streets of the city Guulrahn.

Name: Hakan's Refuge
Description: This one grand manor lies in ruins, festering with memories.

Name: Hallowed Ossuary
Description: A tomb of martyrs, desecrated and made powerful again.

Name: Hallowed Stones
Description: Amidst a storm of evil, something hopeful flickers weakly.

Name: Halls of the Damned
Description: Triune mages once pioneered strange magics here...

Name: Haunted Refuge
Description: The old church sinks into the delta, drowning slowly.

Name: Heathen's Keep
Description: These Knights have sworn allegiance to a new leader.

Name: Hell Touched
Description: Extra Infernal Shrines and 20% more Glyph Experience earned at the end of this dungeon.

Name: Hellfire
Description: Monsters are afflicted with Hellfire, which transfers to players when killed. Hellfire increases damage, but deals damage overtime for each stack. Using a potion helps alleviate hellfire with a fiery explosion.

Name: Heretics Asylum
Description: A jail home to the corrupt and cruel.

Name: Hierophant Pyre
Description: Once used to burn opposers of Sankekur, the pyres are relit.

Name: Hive
Description: An insatiable will drives these creatures to feed.

Name: Hoarfrost Demise
Description: An icy Goatman cave, littered with corpses and bones.

Name: Howling Warren
Description: A corrupted den of wolves and wargs, hungry for human flesh.

Name: Immortal Emanation
Description: A hunting ground, when prey is foolish enough to enter.

Name: Increased Critical Strike
Description: Your Critical Strike chance is increased by 9%.

Name: Increased Healing
Description: Your Healing Received is increased by 15%.

Name: Inferno
Description: We have carved into the rock to seek Hell.

Name: Iron Cenotaph
Description: The first home of the Iron Wolves before the fall of Kurast.

Name: Iron Hold
Description: A scourge stirs within the bowels of a decaying prison.

Name: Jalal's Vigil
Description: A forest, soured by the agony of its own protector.

Name: Komdor Temple
Description: A Triune sect cursed to forever walk Sanctuary as goatmen.

Name: Kor Dragan Barracks
Description: The honored halls have been left for the dead to wander.

Name: Kor Valar Ramparts
Description: A corrupted fortress concealing the sins of the Penitents.

Name: Leviathan's Maw
Description: Cultists lurk in these flooded ruins.

Name: Light's Refuge
Description: In a forgotten home lies a nest made of teeth and armor.

Name: Light's Watch
Description: A Knights' keep, repurposed for bandits and other parasites.

Name: Lightning Caller
Description: You occasionally call down lightning strikes that damage nearby enemies.

Name: Lightning Damage
Description: You deal 15% more Lightning damage.

Name: Lightning Storm
Description: Lightning gathers above the player. Get into the protection dome to avoid severe outcomes.

Name: Lost Archives
Description: Many speculate what lies within, but few dare to venture on.

Name: Lost Keep
Description: Yet another rotting keep abandoned by the Cathedral.

Name: Luban's Rest
Description: A warrior and her followers have risen from their tombs.

Name: Maddux Watch
Description: This abandoned outpost treads atop the dead.

Name: Magic Find
Description: You find more items from enemies.

Name: Mariner's Refuge
Description: The Drowned lure shipwrecked sailors to the depths.

Name: Maugan's Works
Description: A rotting hall for criminals and deserters.

Name: Maulwood
Description: Bandits have claimed these woods and its monsters.

Name: Melee Defenders
Description: Monsters take 40% less damage from close targets

Name: Mercy's Reach
Description: This crumbling keep was once a way through the mountains.

Name: Monster Attack Speed
Description: Monsters attack 25% faster.

Name: Monster Barrier
Description: Monsters gain 85% of their Maximum Life as a Barrier.

Name: Monster Bleed Resist
Description: Monsters take 60% less Bleeding damage.

Name: Monster Bleeding Damage
Description: Monsters deal an additional 30% of their Physical damage dealt as Bleeding over 5 seconds.

Name: Monster Burning Damage
Description: Monsters deal an additional 30% of their Physical damage dealt as Burning over 5 seconds.

Name: Monster Burning Resist
Description: Monsters take 60% less Burning damage.

Name: Monster Cold Damage
Description: Monsters deal an additional 20% of their Physical damage dealt as Cold.

Name: Monster Cold Resist
Description: Monsters take 40% less Cold damage.

Name: Monster Critical Resist
Description: Monster attacks reduce the damage of your Critical Strikes for 3 seconds by 6%, stacking up to 60%.

Name: Monster Crowd Control Resist
Description: Crowd Control duration vs monsters is reduced by 40%.

Name: Monster Fire Damage
Description: Monsters deal an additional 20% of their Physical damage dealt as Fire.

Name: Monster Fire Resist
Description: Monsters take 40% less Fire damage.

Name: Monster Life
Description: Monsters gain 30% extra life.

Name: Monster Life Steal
Description: Non-boss monsters gain 15% Life Steal.

Name: Monster Lightning Damage
Description: Monsters deal an additional 20% of their Physical damage dealt as Lightning.

Name: Monster Overpower Resist
Description: Monster attacks reduce the damage of your next Overpower attack by 12%. Stacking up to 60%.

Name: Monster Physical Resist
Description: Monsters take 30% less Physical damage.

Name: Monster Poison Damage
Description: Monsters deal an additional 30% of their Physical damage dealt as Poison over 5 seconds.

Name: Monster Poison Resist
Description: Monsters take 60% less Poison damage.

Name: Monster Regen
Description: Non-boss monsters regen 1.5% Maximum Life per second.

Name: Monster Shadow Damage
Description: Monsters deal an additional 20% of their Physical damage dealt as Shadow.

Name: Monster Shadow Damage Over Time
Description: Monsters deal an additional 30% of their Physical damage dealt as Shadow over 5 seconds.

Name: Monster Shadow Damage Over Time Resist
Description: Monsters take 60% reduced damage from your Shadow damage over time effects.

Name: Monster Shadow Resist
Description: Monsters take 40% less Shadow damage.

Name: Monster Thorns
Description: Monsters reflect 8% of damage.

Name: Monster Vulnerable Resist
Description: Duration of Vulnerable Effects vs monsters is reduced by 60%.

Name: Monsters Lightning Resist
Description: Monsters take 40% less Lightning damage.

Name: Mournfield
Description: What walks here is living and dead and will rob you.

Name: Murmuring Spiral
Description: Scales and spirals hypnotize, and some come too close.

Name: Nightmare Portal
Description: While in combat, Nightmare Portals open randomly near players, pouring out dangerous monsters.

Name: Nostrava Deepwood
Description: The undead roam among the trees.

Name: Nudging Evade
Description: Using Evade pushes enemies back.

Name: Oblivion
Description: The demons of Eriman's Pyre fled to this crumbling prison.

Name: Oldstones
Description: Khazra infest the ruined holdfast, ignorant of its curse.

Name: Onyx Hold
Description: Undead wardens still patrol the halls of this prison.

Name: Pallid Delve
Description: Cannibals guard a dark power in the crumbling mines.

Name: Path of the Blind
Description: The bloodstained initiation grounds for Triune aspirants.

Name: Penitent Cairns
Description: Glenfolk know to avoid grottoes the spirits hold sacred.

Name: Physical Damage
Description: You deal 15% more Physical damage.

Name: Poison Damage
Description: You deal 15% more Poison damage

Name: Poisonous Evade
Description: Using Evade leaves a damaging pool of Poison under the first enemy you evade through or at your destination.

Name: Potion Breakers
Description: Monster attacks from a distance increase the cooldown of your next potion by 0.75 seconds, up to 7 seconds.

Name: Prison of Caldeum
Description: Something wicked stirs in the prison.

Name: Putrescent Larder
Description: The repugnant air affirms where Lacuni store their meats.

Name: Putrid Aquifer
Description: Death taints the water.

Name: Quick Killer
Description: Killing a monster grants 2.0% Attack and Move Speed. Stacking up to 20%.

Name: Raethwind Wilds
Description: Too many have vanished into these woods.

Name: Ranged Defenders
Description: Monsters take 60% less damage from distant targets.

Name: Razak's Descent
Description: Where light is lost and intentions are twisted within roots.

Name: Reduce Cooldowns on Kill
Description: Killing a monster reduces your cooldowns by .25 seconds.

Name: Remnants of Rage
Description: Within these confines, something restless trembles.

Name: Renegade's Retreat
Description: Renegade knights reap the spoils of Inarius’ crusade.

Name: Resistance Breakers
Description: Monster attacks from a distance reduce Resistance to All Elements by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 25%.

Name: Resource Burn
Description: After you spend resource, you burn an additional 30% of the resource spent for every time you were hit by a Distant enemy.

Name: Rimescar Cavern
Description: A cave reclaimed by demons and sickened with their magic.

Name: Ruined Wild
Description: A place of spirituality is now home to unwelcomed guests.

Name: Ruins of Eridu
Description: A once-mighty fortress consumed by the swamp.

Name: Sanguine Chapel
Description: A snowed in abandoned Zakarum church invaded by vampires.

Name: Sarat's Lair
Description: What once was a wildlife den has become a nest.

Name: Sealed Archives
Description: An ancient mage hall. Once refuge, now graveyard.

Name: Seaside Descent
Description: A cove nestled among a graveyard of shipwrecks.

Name: Seething Underpass
Description: Submerged corruption rises from the sunken channels.

Name: Sepulcher of The Forsworn
Description: Evil stirs below the altar of Baal.

Name: Serpent's Lair
Description: Once the seat of Mohlon's throne. They want another queen.

Name: Shadow Damage
Description: You deal 15% more Shadow damage.

Name: Shadowed Plunge
Description: Snake Cultists sacrifice the innocent.

Name: Shifting City
Description: These ruins were once a refuge for the people of Qara-Yisu.

Name: Shivta Ruins
Description: The corruption in Alcarnus has bled into these ruins.

Name: Sirocco Caverns
Description: A foul infestation has claimed these caverns.

Name: Skatsimi Fane
Description: Long deprived of worship, who knows what remains of the old.

Name: Sleepless Hollow
Description: When the dead are forgotten, flesh and bone rise again.

Name: Slowing Projectiles
Description: Monster attacks from a distance have a 50% chance to slow targets.

Name: Steadfast Barracks
Description: A nest of savage fanatics, drawn to evil long-buried.

Name: Stockades
Description: After a riot, this prison was walled off and made a tomb.

Name: Stormbane's Wrath
Description: Stormbane's Wrath chases players around, releasing deadly pulses when reaching a player.

Name: Sunken Library
Description: The dead guard secrets confined in the ancient vault.

Name: Sunken Ruins
Description: Rumors stir of a healer turned renegade necromancer.

Name: The Beast in Ice
Description: Face a more challenging Beast in Ice at the end of this frozen cave.

Name: Thorns
Description: After attacking an enemy, your Thorns are increased by 200 for 3 seconds, up to 1000 at max stacks.

Name: Tomb of Hallows
Description: Death is in the halls. Ancient and fresh. Dying and undying.

Name: Tomb of the Saints
Description: This barren tomb was once fat with gold.

Name: Tormented Ruins
Description: It's been centuries since this watchtower saw mortal use.

Name: Twisted Hollow
Description: A veritable reservoir of wildlife where answers may lurk.

Name: Ularian Sepulcher
Description: Cursed burial ground, feared by all.

Name: Uldur's Cave
Description: A den of murderers and carrion feeders.

Name: Underroot
Description: Ruins deep under Túr Dúlra, its roots thick with rot.

Name: Unstoppable Monsters
Description: Monsters become Unstoppable when life drops below 30%.

Name: Vault of The Forsaken
Description: The voices in these flooded caves lure many to their demise.

Name: Vile Hive
Description: The sounds of skittering fiends echo through this foul nest.

Name: Volcanic
Description: While in combat, gouts of flame periodically erupt near players.

Name: Whispering Pines
Description: Astaroth is gone now, but his grip on this keep holds fast.

Name: Whispering Vault
Description: Scholarly halls haunted by whispering spirits of the insane.

Name: Witchwater
Description: Nangari cultists lure prey here with songs sung in dreams.

Name: Wretched Delve
Description: Demonic plague festers now in the old tombs of Túr Dúlra.

Name: Yshari Sanctum
Description: Cultists corrupt the ancient Sanctum.

Name: Zenith
Description: Unmapped tunnels sprawl beneath the peaks.
